alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 12:40PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Nassau, northwestern St. Johns, southeastern Baker, northern Clay, Duval and southeastern Camden Counties through 145 PM EST... At 1240 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kings Bay Base to near Glen St. Mary. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland, Fernandina Beach, Orange Park, Callahan, Jacksonville International Arpt, Kings Bay Base, Arlington, Ponte Vedra Beach and Unf. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
